Lyrics: Si le secours que de longtemps j'attends
Poetic Translation: If my relief, the rescue I await,

Lyrics: Ne vient de brief et que n'ay ce que pretens,
Poetic Translation: Does not come soon, and I am robbed of my fate,

Lyrics: Ma vie ne peult avoir longue durée,
Direct Translation: See translation at Choral Public Domain Library.
Poetic Translation: Then in one breath, existence will be stifled:

Lyrics: Car d'ainsi vivre, je suis trop ennuyé.
Poetic Translation: Without my purpose, there is no point in life.
